title: Inspector Spacetime
description: Created by Ex-Sir Anthony Bonham Pease in the 1960s, the Inspector travels through time and space in his X-7 Dimensionizer and with his loyal Constable. Enjoy five decades of episodes including the Inspector Spacetime Christmas Special.
